City Council

The City Council meets on 4th Tuesday of each month at 6 p.m. in Council Chambers at 311 E. Main St

  • James Wansley , Mayor
  • Zack Briscoe , Place 1
  • Froncel Burns , Place 2
  • John Chambers , Place 3
  • Michael Lowe , Place 4
  • Matt Lazarine , Place 5

About the City Council

The City Council is the legislative and governing body for the City of Whitehouse. The Council consists of 5 council members and a mayor. The election of councilmembers is at large and by place while the mayor is elected solely at large. Each memberâ€™s term is 2 years.
